title: North Esports looking for Plat V + players!

embed.description: The latest Tweets from North Esports (@NorthEsportsNE). Esports Gaming Organisation

body:
Australia's newest up and coming Esports organisation is **looking for players to fill its LoL Esports competitive team! ** Want the chance to be a sponsored player and compete at LANS? North Esports encourages all players of Plat + skill level to enquire within. We have a team of experienced staff and coaches ready to take our team to the top. Contact us on our new Twitter page for my info! 

North Decos - Manager of North Esports

replies.body:
We have a team of diamond 5's that is serious about reaching the top. We practice every day and are interested in joining your organisation. We have 5 plus one sub committed players, however half of our team is from New Zealand.
 Tweeted You!
We are gods when we work together
I guess they want to try people out and there are many plats+ want to be in a team and play in high level situation like me so i am able to learn what i am doing wrong

If only that were the case.
I tweeted them with interest but they changed their minds to only Diamond 1 + players.
If you are serious about growing your org i highly recommend that you find a good challenger team with D1+ players, not plat players.
